author: Audrey Saunders
description: *Note: Angostura aromatic bitters contain alcohol but in the finished drink the alcohol level is negligible. Balanced and adult but cries out for rum.
name: Grapefruit Daiquiri #2 (Alcohol-free*)
recipeIngredient: 15 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0Â°brix)

recipeInstructions.text: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass
